Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2-4: PT Tracker API integration, PT Editor, Offline Queue

Phase 2: Integrate API in pt_tracker.html
- Replace saveSessionWithNotes\(\) to use insertExerciseCompletion API
- Add transaction toast with copy button \(iOS-safe, no onclick\)
- Add offline indicator at top of screen
- Add auto-replay listener for offline queue

Phase 3: Create Unified PT Editor
- Add pt/pt_editor.html - Unified exercise library browser and editor
- Add link from pt_view.html to PT Editor
- iOS/Safari compatible \(data-action, 44px touch targets, 16px fonts\)

Phase 4: Offline Queue with IndexedDB
- Create pt/shared/offline_queue.js - IndexedDB-based queue manager
- Wrap all write operations in pt_data_api.js with offline queue
- Auto-replay queued operations when connection restored

Audit fixes applied:
- Real ULIDs only \(no fake prefixes\)
- Server timestamp primary, client timestamp fallback when offline
- Uses canonical Firestore path: users/{userId}/sessions
- IndexedDB only \(no localStorage\)
- Immutable completions \(sets array written once\)
